title: Urugudhey Lyrics Veyil
stanzas:
Urugudhey marugudhey
Orey paarvaiyaale
Urugudhey marugudhey
Orey paarvaiyaale
Ulagamae sulaludhey
unnai paarthathaale

Hey
Ambuliyil nanaindhu
santhikkira pozhudhu
Anbu kathai pesi pesi
vidyuthu iravu

Aezhu kadal thaandi thaan
Aezhu malai thaandi thaan
En karuthe machchan
kitta odi varum manasu

Sami paarthu
kumbidum podhum
Nee than en nenjil irukka

Oora vittu engeyum
verarunthu nikkiren
Koodu thanthe kili penne
unnaale than vaazhuren

Kooru pattu selaithan
vaanga solli kekuren
Koodi vittu koodu paaya
kadhalale suthuren

Mai itte kanne unnai
Marantha irandhe poven

Urugudhey marugudhey
Orey paarvaiyaale
Urugudhey marugudhey
Orey paarvaiyaale
Ulagamae sulaludhey
unnai paarthathaale

seo.title: Urugudhey Lyrics Veyil
seo.description: Get the complete Urugudhey Lyrics Veyil from Veyil. Read the lyrics penned by Na Muthukumar and composed by GV PrakashKumar and sung by Shankar Mahadevan. Perfect for fans looking for the full Tamil text and song meaning.
seo.keywords: Na Muthukumar, Veyil, GV PrakashKumar, Shankar Mahadevan, Shreya Goshal, Tamil lyrics, Tamil songs
